code: import{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import'../styles/TaskManager.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Contact(){const[formData,setFormData]=useState({name:'',email:'',message:''});const[isSubmitting,setIsSubmitting]=useState(false);const[submitStatus,setSubmitStatus]=useState({type:'',message:''});const handleChange=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setFormData(prev=>({...prev,[name]:value}));};const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setIsSubmitting(true);setSubmitStatus({type:'',message:''});try{const response=await axios.post('https://muhaitheef.infinityfreeapp.com/contact/submit_contact.php',formData,{headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});if(response.data.status==='success'){setSubmitStatus({type:'success',message:response.data.message});setFormData({name:'',email:'',message:''});}else{setSubmitStatus({type:'error',message:response.data.message});}}catch(error){setSubmitStatus({type:'error',message:'Failed to send message. Please try again later.'});}finally{setIsSubmitting(false);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"task-manager",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Contact Us"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"task-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Send us a message"}),submitStatus.type&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:`alert ${submitStatus.type==='success'?'success':'error'}`,children:submitStatus.message}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"name",children:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"name",name:"name",className:"form-control",value:formData.name,onChange:handleChange,required:true,disabled:isSubmitting})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"email",children:"Email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",id:"email",name:"email",className:"form-control",value:formData.email,onChange:handleChange,required:true,disabled:isSubmitting})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"message",children:"Message"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{id:"message",name:"message",className:"form-control",value:formData.message,onChange:handleChange,required:true,disabled:isSubmitting})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn btn-primary",disabled:isSubmitting,children:isSubmitting?'Sending...':'Send Message'})]})]})]});}export default Contact;
